thread.section_title: Greatmats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greatmats | www.greatmats.com
thread.title: Creative Enclosures

author: Creative Enclosures
title: Creative Enclosures
text: I shopped for this exact color and thickness carpet tile for days. Either no one had it in stock, or the price was double what Greatmatts was charging. Not only did I receive a great price and a great Carpet Tile, I also received an additional discount and free shipping. I have since saved this company in my favorites and know I will utilize them as my "go to" in special event flooring comfort. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND! YOU WILL NOT BE DISSAPOINTED.
